scripts.deploy:stage: func azure functionapp publish fa-products-service-ne-999 --slot non-prod
scripts.deploy:prod: az functionapp deployment slot swap --name "fa-products-service-ne-999" --resource-group "rg-product-service-sand-ne-002" --slot non-prod --target-slot production
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:stage && npm run deploy:prod
